channel.title: [HELP] How to change the clients name?
channel.description:
I need help on changing the clients name.. I need to do this so I can release my own client but give original owner credits.. I've never been good with clients so I need help :). Please help.
EDIT: Also, I want to know how to change the default IP to my IP?
I'm willing to give REP to who ever helps. :)

item.title: [HELP] How to change the clients name?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Gui, Egui, Client.java, etc.

Change it, Compile.

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] How to change the clients name?

item.title: [HELP] How to change the clients name?
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
item.description:
@laveerre wrote:

to change ALL the names go to the search menu in your start tab and search for ‘‘what ever your client is named’’ by typing the name into the ‘‘word or sentance of the file’’ thing.Open all the files and change the name to your clients name.You may too change the run.bat by right clicking the run.bat and pressing edit and changing that to what u want…The shortest way:Change the name of the client in texthandler.java…

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] How to change the clients name?

item.title: [HELP] How to change the clients name?
item.dc:creator: @r_o_l_l_cage r o l l cage
item.description:
@r_o_l_l_cage wrote:

go it to Gui (or frame_sub_1)
ctrl-f “PVP Client”
then change the name

item.title: [HELP] How to change the clients name?
item.dc:creator: @ernis11231 ernis11231
item.description:
@ernis11231 wrote:

to change server ip go to Gui (if ur using the same client as me) press Ctrl+F ,look for “ip” in the “” put your ip address e.g Serverip = “12.34.56.789”;

but if you want,to log in on ur server urself change it

serverip = “127.0.0.1”

so,u will need two same clients,one for u with Gui 127.0.0.1
and one for other people to send them to play with ur ip.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] How to change the clients name?

item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

Sorry, but I don’t know much about clients as you may have guessed. But I will try what you have said

EDIT: Sorry, that didn’t change the client name. What I mean’t was like the top bit of the client which has a name. For e.g. PVP Client; it has the name of that above the File and them??

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] How to change the clients name?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

You provided very little information but i presume you should open a file called client.java and then press Ctrl+H and input the client name and then your client name and click replace.

Read full topic
